Text: En agosto del año 2008 vi este película en el cine en Bogotá Colombia con mi novia. Es un cuento de verdad y allá siempre pasa los secuestros de gente. Además esto es una película increible que me gusta mucho.

Thank you so much for uploading this movie! It is a great film and I hope more people will watch it! I know this movie still hasn't made its way to film yet, due to Colombia and their lack of technology and resources to put their films on DVD. It came out in theaters August of 2008 and I think it is finally making it's way to DVD sometime this December or January of 2010.
I'm stuck at 94.5% I hope the rest will be uploaded to me ASAP. I really appreciate that this movie was made available and I will be uploading it for a long time!
